    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Scene

        public Scene()

    • メソッドの詳細

      • init

        public void init()
        Called before first rendering.

      • onStartRendering

        public void onStartRendering()
        Called when this Scene is activated by MeganekkoApp.setScene(Scene). If you override this method, you must call super.onStartRendering().

      • onStopRendering

        public void onStopRendering()
        Called when other Scene is activated by MeganekkoApp.setScene(Scene).

      • onKeyPressed

        public boolean onKeyPressed(int keyCode,
                            int repeatCount)

      • onKeyDoubleTapped

        public boolean onKeyDoubleTapped(int keyCode,
                                 int repeatCount)

        public boolean onKeyLongPressed(int keyCode,
                                int repeatCount)

      • onKeyDown

        public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                         int repeatCount)

      • onKeyUp

        public boolean onKeyUp(int keyCode,
                       int repeatCount)

      • onKeyMax

        public boolean onKeyMax(int keyCode,
                        int repeatCount)
